name: Breta's 7 Layer Dip
author: Kat Sorenson
summary: Beans, guacamole, sour cream and cheese layered to perfection! I am known for my 7 layer dip ever since I've been making this. Serve with your favorite tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 (9 ounce) can hot bean dip (such as Fritos® Brand)
1 (4 ounce) can chopped black olives, drained
directions: Mix refried beans with hot bean dip in a bowl; spread the bean mixture in an even layer over a pizza pan
Mix avocados with salsa in a bowl; spread mixture over the bean mixture
Place dollops of sour cream over avocado layer and spread into an even layer; top with shredded Cheddar cheese
Sprinkle black olives, diced tomatoes, and green onions over the dip
Chill at least 1 hour before serving
